{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=PL6411 |revision=-2nD |series= |asin=B07MKZLFRG |is_manuf=No |manuf= |fcc_date=06/22/2018 |fcc_id=TV7PL64112ND |ic_id=7442A-PL64112ND |type=Powerline Access Point |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.15 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-BL3A; |cpu2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu2_model=QCA6410;QCA6410-AL3C; |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9533;QCA9533-BL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=HomePlug AV |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|PWR-LINE AP (US Plug)}} :[https://mikrotik.com/product/pwr_line_ap_us_plug Product page] (US plug) <!--{{FCC ST|12/18/2018|indexme.}}-->
"Makes 100Mbit links with others like it" - [https://mum.mikrotik.com/presentations/EU18/presentation_5128_1522914661.pdf Source]
===See also=== :;[[MikroTik]] • [https://mikrotik.com/products/group/data-over-powerlines PowerLine Devices] *[[MikroTik PL6400]] (PWR-LINE US) • [https://mikrotik.com/product/pwr_line_us PPage] :[[QCA]] QCA6410 (PLC), micro USB (Type A) power plug *[[MikroTik PL6411-2nD]] (PWR-LINE AP - US Plug) • [https://mikrotik.com/product/pwr_line_ap_us_plug PPage] :[[QCA]] QCA9533 (@650MHz) / QCA6410 (PLC), 16/64 MB *[[MikroTik PL7400]] (PWR-LINE EU) • [https://mikrotik.com/product/pwr_line_eu PPage] :[[QCA]] AR7420 (PLC), micro USB (Type C) power plug *[[MikroTik PL7411-2nD]] (PWR-LINE AP - EU Plug) • [https://mikrotik.com/product/pwr_line_ap PPage] :[[QCA]] QCA9533 (@650MHz) / AR7420 (PLC), 16/64 MB *[[MikroTik PL7510Gi]] (PWR-LINE PRO) • [https://mikrotik.com/product/pl7510gi PPage] :[[QCA]] QCA7550 (PLC), Passive PoE (in 18-30V/350mA)
